title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5505.2 - Disruptive conduct
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5505.2 - Disruptive conduct

State Regulations

Any person who shall conduct himself in a manner which
interferes, or threatens or tends to interfere, with the free, orderly and safe
flow of traffic on the facilities can be denied the use of the
facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5505.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
